DOC.brief_summary: This study double-blinded placebo-controlled clinical trial evaluate efficacy 1 gram topically apply tranexamic acid vs. saline placebo reduction transfusion follow hip hemiarthroplasty surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Topical ( Intra-Articular ) Tranexamic Acid Transfusion Rates Following Hip Hemiarthroplasty
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo hip hemiarthroplasty surgery displace femoral neck fracture History hemophilia , history deep vein thrombosis , history pulmonary embolism , history thrombophilia , history chronic renal failure Patients coronary ischemia ( active within past calendar year ) , patient suffer myocardial infarction , undergone percutaneous coronary intervention , undergone coronary artery bypass grafting , undergone revascularization procedure within past calendar year Patients active subarachnoid hemorrhage , acquire defective color vision , patient sustain pathologic fracture ( fracture neoplastic lesion ) , patient pregnant Patients know allergy tranexamic acid Patients take Warfarin , Dabigatran , Rivaroxaban , Apixaban , Fresh Frozen Plasma
